issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KS
2. Platform > XHR > File Download
3. Set Web View (url) 

Actual:
does not load: [WARN] couldn't load URL: app://com.appcelerator.titanium/var/mobile/Applications/5DEF0B15-6138-4DDB-9776-0933582BF9CD/Documents/test.pdf

Expected:
Should load
fields.summary: iOS: Platform: Set Web View (url)  does not load

comments.body: Seems like this was an issue with the website not being up... It seems to be up and running now. So marking it as cannot reproduce...

Closing bug. Could not reproduce bug in the following environment:

SDK build: 1.8.0.1
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201091758
Devices: ipad 1st Gen (4.3.5), iphone 4S Verizon (5.0.1)
